about_the_game:
iVIBRATE Ultimate Edition - iMASSAGE Gold Edition converts iVIBRATE to iMASSAGE! iMASSAGE is intended as a way to turn your gamepad into personal massager for helping muscle aches and tension. This DLC converts iVIBRATE to the safe to use iMASSAGE for everyone. Made popular outside of Steam, yet "retired" by Steam; you can now get iMASSAGE as a free DLC, converting the look and intended use!

*This DLC is a visual alteration and does not change the way iVIBRATE functions*

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 125 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Will more than likely work on requirements less than this.

  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Will more than likely work on requirements less than this.
